main.name: Benjamin Castellan
main.description: Hey there 👋 I am a freelance Software Engineer based in Paris
main.bio: I am a french software engineer, currently living in Paris, but I also lived in Singapore, Dubai, South Korea and in the south of France. I started learning coding in 2014, and started my first programming job in 2018 and still enjoy coding everyday. I also travelled through South America during six months just before Covid hit.
main.contactmessage: If you have a project and need a professional and talented software engineer, please send me an email.

education.school: Telecom Paris (Institut Polytechnique de Paris), Paris, France
education.description: Studied various field such as System security, embedded systems and machine learning.
Studied Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry during 2 intensive years.

work.title: Junior mobile developer - Lead mobile developer (remote)
work.description: Led end-to-end development across iOS, Android, and backend platforms, driving continuous improvement and feature expansion to enhance user experience and functionality.

work.title: iOS Developer (remote, from Dubai)
work.description: Implemented new functionality to enhance the iOS application's feature set and user experience.

work.title: Lead developer (Paris, France)
work.description: Was in charge of all the development for the websites used internally and by the clients and for the app and the server.

projects.title: SARA Hotel Operations Platform
projects.category: SARA is a new hotel operations platform for your team to track and manage all service requests (Maintenance, housekeeping, room service, concierge, IT….and much more) for better operational efficiency.
